content.question:
Show all your work. Indicate clearly the methods you use, because you will be scored on the correctness of your methods as well as on the accuracy and completeness of your results and explanations.

Researchers at a large university with a population of <math alttext="20,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> students are investigating student opinions about the university fitness center. A list of the names of students and how often they use the fitness center is available.

Two methods of stratification are being considered for selecting a sample of <math alttext="120" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>120</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> students.

Method <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>I</mtext></math> - Stratify by how often students use the fitness center (no usage, infrequent usage, and frequent usage).

Method <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>II</mtext></math> - Stratify by first letter of students’ last names (<math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="G" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>G</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>M</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>T</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>).

(a) Which of the two methods for creating the strata, method <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>I</mtext></math> or method <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>II</mtext></math>, should the researchers use for their investigation? Explain your answer.
